casebody.data:
LEROY H. DEARHOLT v. MYRTLE HUBBEL DEARHOLT [No. 36,

October Term, 1938.]

*695 Decided November 16th, 1938. The cause was argued before Bond, C. J., Urner, Offutt, Parke, Mitchell, Shehan, and Johnson, JJ. Simon Silverberg, with whom were Silverberg & Silver-berg and Ginsberg & Ginsberg on the brief, for the appellant. Philander B. Briscoe, with whom were Briscoe & Jones on the brief, for the appellee. Bond, C. J.,

delivered the opinion of the Court.
